SCRIPT.MSCRI: ! Reading xml file and pleace it in one AE variable :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_FILE (&AGENT#, "&UC4RB_SLM_FILE_PATH#",,"COL=NONE", 'UC_LOGIN=&LOGIN#') :SET &UC4RB_SLM_FILE_CONTENT# = "" :PROCESS &HND# : SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : SET &UC4RB_SLM_FILE_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SLM_FILE_CONTENT#, &LINE#) :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#

DOCU_Docu.DOC: This include is used to read the data from the given file.
